title: The Orange grower
brief_description: The story of an orange-grower and his family in the citrus fruit growing area of USA and how they raise and harvest their crop. Budding, pruning, planting, fertilising, irrigating, controlling weeds and pests, and combating extremes of temperature, are shown in detail.
